text: Sore wa shito-tachi ga, samazamana meishō o motte kare-ra no moto ni kitanoni mo kakawarazu,`ningen ga, watashi-tachi o michibikeyou ka.' To itta tamedearu. Sore de kare-ra wa shinjiyou to sezu somuki satta. Daga arrā wa, nani mo motome rarenai. Arrā wa, michi tara reru okata sanbi sa rerubeki okata de ara reru
